name: HD Offline Dinosaur
description:
Description:  Another 2 Week Project I did where I recreated the Offline Dinosaur while using Unity's HDRP Settings. Can you reach the boss level?

Controls:

Up Arrow/Spacebar: Jump
Down Arrow: Duck

Playtime: 1-2 Minutes

Offline Dinosaur was originally created by Google's UX Team:

Sebastien Gabriel, Alan Bettes, and Edward Jung.

Sounds are also owned by Google

If you have any issues or questions, please post your issues in the comments so I can fix them. Thanks for playing!
